answers.answer: HiSome of the causes of foul smelling urine can be:Diet: coffee, asparagusInfection: bladder, prostate or any where along the urinary tractDehydration: concentrated urine has a strong smellDiabetes: has a fruity odor in ketoacidosisOne of the common causes is infection which can be diagnosed and treated easily by your doctor. You should visit your doctor for a urine examination and evaluation to find out the exact cause and treatment for the foul smell.Take care and do write in if you need more information.Regards

question: I am a 36yr old MaleI have recently noticed an odor when I urinate. A little while back my girlfriend had noticed an odor when she urinated. she went to the doctors and was told she had a UTI. they gave her some antibiotics and it has cleared up and odor is gone. shortly after I noticed an odor in my urine.Question: Is it possible that I now have some kind of UTI or similar type infection. Because I didn't have this problem prior to hers.any feedback is appreciated.. Thanks
title: odor in urine
